frontmatter.title: Container
frontmatter.description: The `Wizard.Container` is a container component for multi-page forms including a step indicator.

frontmatter.title: Step
frontmatter.description: Each step should be wrapped with a `Wizard.Step` component directly inside Wizard.Container.

frontmatter.title: Buttons
frontmatter.description: `Wizard.Buttons` is a combination of PreviousButton and NextButton for navigating between steps/pages.

frontmatter.title: useStep
frontmatter.description: `Wizard.useStep` returns `Wizard.Context` parameters such as totalSteps, activeIndex or a setActiveIndex handler.

frontmatter.title: Location Hooks
frontmatter.description: Is a set of React Hooks that lets you easily hook up your existing router in order to store the current step in the URL query string.
